messages.subject: Kevin was Re: The account of Sandra in Saskatoon
messages.msgSnippet: ... Oh Debbie I hope he s doing better by the time you read this. I ll be thinking about you all and sending healing thoughts your way. (That s as close as I
messages.messageBody:
>>Kevin is very sick, but he is stable. He's sleeping now while getting a
>>blood transfusion, so I thought I'd distract myself from hovering and
>>worrying. <g> >>

Oh Debbie I hope he's doing better by the time you read this. I'll be
thinking about you all and sending healing thoughts your way. (That's as
close as I come to praying.)

Life is good.
~Mary
